name: Rest In Pisces [GDP2022]
description:
This game was made during the 19th edition of The Game Dev Party in less than 48 hours!

The theme of this edition was "Underwater Lost World".

What is your purpose as a zombie underwater?

Well you don't have any... Walk for as far as you can before the deep spikes get you, for these creatures, you are easy meal if you cannot find a way to defend yourself!

Don't worry there are several limbs at your disposal and the controls are easy :

- Left Joystick to walk and run in a direction.

- Right Joystick to direct your upper-body.

- Button A to confirm.

- If you loose all your lives then sadly you will stop at the distance you reached and become one more asset in the wet desert... Don't worry though, soon you will raise again!

Our Team is composed by :

Julien Plateau - Developer, Assets Integration

Pierre Szymanski - Sound Designer, Composer

Guillaume Perouffe - Developer

Anton Monjon - Tech Artist

Philippe Hartmann - Game Designer, Game Artist

Thank you for trying our game!
